<a id="ResourceImporterSVG"></a>

# ResourceImporterSVG

**Inherits:** [ResourceImporter](ResourceImporter.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Imports an SVG file as an automatically scalable texture for use in UI elements and 2D rendering.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This importer imports [DPITexture](DPITexture.md) resources. See also [ResourceImporterTexture](ResourceImporterTexture.md) and [ResourceImporterImage](ResourceImporterImage.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="ResourceImporterSVG_property_base_scale"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **base_scale** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#ResourceImporterSVG_property_base_scale)

Texture scale. ``1.0`` is the original SVG size. Higher values result in a larger image.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ResourceImporterSVG_property_color_map"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Dictionary](Dictionary.md) **color_map** = `{}` [ðŸ”—](#ResourceImporterSVG_property_color_map)

If set, remaps texture colors according to [Color](Color.md)-[Color](Color.md) map.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ResourceImporterSVG_property_compress"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **compress** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#ResourceImporterSVG_property_compress)

If ``true``, uses lossless compression for the SVG source.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ResourceImporterSVG_property_saturation"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **saturation** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#ResourceImporterSVG_property_saturation)

Overrides texture saturation.
